alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:17AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf and southeastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, south central Gadsden, Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 1100 AM EDT/1000 AM CDT/... At 1016 AM EDT/916 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blountstown to 8 miles northeast of Stonemill Creek to near Mexico Beach. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Honeyville, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, Hosford, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Clio, Overstreet, Kennys Mill, Estiffanulga, Kern and Lowry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
